titleStmt.title: The lavvyers plea, in the behalf of young Tom of Lincoln. Being an answer to a late scandalous ballad, entituled, Merry news from Lincolns-Inn. Adrest to the author of the said ballad, by Tom of Lincoln. To the tune of, Help lords and commons, &c.
titleStmt.author: Tom of Lincoln.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "LOrd help us all! what Story's this ..."
"Merry news from Lincolns-Inn" has not been found.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
